fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Burgundy symbolizes wealth, ambition, sophistication, and aggression. Burgundy may visit a player to appear as a threat to its target, making all protective roles on its target focus on it instead of the target, allowing the target to be killed. Burgundy will not be affected by the protective roles.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Burgundy will still affect pacifist protective roles, as it symbolizes wealth, and is able to buy the protectors into submission.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Paint the Town into a rainbow!
